SELECT t.rid AS uid, COUNT(t.rid) AS invitingNum FROM hc_account t WHERE YEARWEEK(create_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), 1) GROUP BY t.rid ORDER BY invitingNum DESC LIMIT 0, 3
